paper_abstract: Given any knot diagram E, we present a sequence of knot diagrams of the same knot type for which the minimum number of Reidemeister moves required to pass to E is quadratic with respect to the number of crossings. These bounds apply both in S (2) and in a"e(2).
paper_title: Unknot Diagrams Requiring a Quadratic Number of Reidemeister Moves to Untangle
